comment: You can do okay in this class but prepared to teach yourself from the book. Her lectures are decent but they aren''t reliable.  She is a little scatter brained and rushes through material. Home as a whole is worth a test grade so do it right Study guides are somewhat helpful too.

Dr. Kalman's great. Very helpful, takes questions and will answer emails fairly promptly. She offers 4 tests, lowest one dropped, online HW and final both worth 20%. Be sure to do the HW and to read the book for tests and you'll do great.

Very kind and sweet teacher. She wants students to strive and shows dedication to that. Four tests, lowest test is dropped automatically, final, and online homework worth 20% each. Lectures feel rushed, but are very fun and informative. Tests are NOT that difficult, JUST READ THE BOOK and you'll do really well. Great teacher! Highly recommend!

Truth is this was a really hard class. I thought Dr. Kalman was sweet however her she rushes through the material all the time often leaving the class confused. She will very often skip steps in math equations so be sure to tell her to go back over it. Her tests are also hard as well. She's not bad but shes definitely not good either.
Very sweet lady. She drops your lowest quiz, lab, and content assignment grade! You grade is made up of quizzes, labs, content assignments, and the final! Take her! -K

Take her if you are a nursing major. Take her during the semester if you want to hurry up and get it over with.  An A is very possible if you study for final and do well on lab assessments and online work.  I am not a science person at all but I still made a B.  She is also very helpful if you have lecture questions.

Such an easy professor. She's very helpful and sweet. She drops your lowest lab, quiz, AND worksheet assessment. Quizzes and hwk all online. 3 attempts for quizzes, 1 attempt for hwk. HIGHLY suggest taking her class.

Very sweet woman. Quizzes are difficult but are all online and aren't a huge part of your grade. Labs were every other week, and she was very specific when grading lab reports - she's so smart. Be sweet to her and she'll help you out. Not my first choice for a lab teacher, but not too bad!

I took this class as a hybrid.  Dr. Kalman is very sweet andn helpful.  She grades very fairly.  THe quizzes are easier (3 attempts to succeed) but the content assessmnets are very hard which bumped my grade down to a B.  Get a good lab partner and go to tutoring for a A

Dr. Kalman is fabulous!  She is very kind & understanding- always willing to help.  The lab reports can be challenging and the WSA quizzes aren't easy, but, with some effort on your part you can make an A.  She drops your lowest grades & curves the final.  She really wants people to learn and succeed. Her background in chemical engineering- smart!

Good teacher. Spends a lot of time before lab going over the procedures. Is willing to help, responds to email very quickly. Grades lab reports tough, so I recommend asking questions and working with a group and you'll get an A, no problem. Would take again if she teaches any upper level labs.

I. Love. Professor. Kalman. I was skeptical at first and bummed about my first lab grade (sig figs, ugh) but the rest of them I got great grades on! She's so helpful, sweet, and knowledgeable. She explains things very well and will answer any and all of your questions. TAKE HER! She's the only professor I've ever rated, and for a reason.
TAKE HER! She is so nice and she helps you on her labs! Its not easy but when is chemistry easy! I recommended all my friends to take her for chem 1212L!
